Container.Name: Facet
Container.Overview:
Facet is a self-hosted personal profile platform that lets you create multiple views of your professional profile for different audiences (recruiters, conferences, clients).
You own your data and control what each audience sees.
Default login: admin@example.com / changeme123 (you'll be prompted to change the password immediately after first login)
Container.ExtraSearchTerms: personal profile portfolio resume cv recruiter conference client self-hosted

Config.Name: Web UI Port
Config.Description: Container Port: 8080

Config.Name: Encryption Key
Config.Description: Used for generating API keys and tokens. Generate with `openssl rand -hex 32`

Config.Name: Public URL
Config.Description: Public URL for Facet (e.g. http://IP_ADDRESS:8080). Used for OAuth callbacks and share links.

Config.Name: Origin URL
Config.Description: Must match APP_URL

Config.Name: Admin Emails
Config.Description: Comma-separated email allowlist for OAuth login

Config.Name: Behind Proxy
Config.Description: Set to true if running behind a reverse proxy

Config.Name: OAuth - Google - Client ID
Config.Description: Client ID for 'Sign in with Google'. Redirect URI: YOUR_URL/api/oauth2-redirect

Config.Name: OAuth - Google - Client Secret
Config.Description: Client secret from Google Cloud Console.

Config.Name: OAuth - GitHub - Client ID
Config.Description: Client ID for 'Sign in with GitHub'. Redirect URI: YOUR_URL/api/oauth2-redirect

Config.Name: OAuth - GitHub - Client Secret
Config.Description: Client secret from GitHub OAuth Apps.

Config.Name: AI - OpenAI - API Key
Config.Description: API key for OpenAI services. Required for AI features powered by OpenAI.

Config.Name: AI - Anthropic - API Key
Config.Description: API key for Anthropic services. Required for AI features powered by Anthropic.

Config.Name: AI - Ollama - URL
Config.Description: URL for Ollama API. Required for AI features powered by Ollama.

Config.Name: AI - Ollama - Model
Config.Description: Model name for Ollama API. Required for AI features powered by Ollama.

Config.Name: App Data
Config.Description: Path to the app data

Config.Name: Uploads Storage
Config.Description: Path to the uploads storage

Config.Name: Admin Enabled
Config.Description: Set to true to enable PocketBase admin UI at /_/ for debugging purposes

Config.Name: Internal Port
Config.Description: Internal port. Not recommended to change.

Config.Name: Internal Data Path
Config.Description: Internal data path. Not recommended to change.

Config.Name: Internal Uploads Path
Config.Description: Internal uploads path. Not recommended to change.
